definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: They are in the music room .
Afterwards, we go back in for another lesson until lunch at 12:00.
sentences.chinese: 之后，我们回教室上另一节课，至到12点吃午饭。

sentences.english: The little girl stood in the very back of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 这个小女孩站在教室的最后面。

sentences.english: The cheerful song full of the whole classroom.
sentences.chinese: 欢快的歌声充满了整间教室。

sentences.english: The students must be in the classrooms by seven o'clock at the latest.
sentences.chinese: 学生最迟也要在七点钟前进教室。

sentences.english: I rised my head and saw the ceiling was dropping, felt the classroom was sinking.
sentences.chinese: 我抬头，看见房顶往下塌，感觉教室在不停地下沉。

sentences.english: Some people think it quite possible for network classrooms to take the place of traditional classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为网络教室很可能取代传统的教室。

sentences.english: Some people think it quite possible for network classrooms to take the place of traditional classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为网络教室很可能取代传统的教室。

sentences.english: Thereis a teacher's desk and many desks in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 有一个讲台和许多课桌在教室里。

sentences.english: We shared glances in class and laughed at each other's jokes.
sentences.chinese: 我们在教室相互凝视着，各自嘲笑对方所讲的笑话。

sentences.english: Our classroom is the differerent scal as theirs.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的教室和她们的相同大。

sentences.english: He sits in the front of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 教室前面有个投币式电话。

sentences.english: Whatever a teacher does in the classroom will have effect on the students.
sentences.chinese: 老师在教室里的一言一行都会影响学生。

sentences.english: It was a sight to watch my hairless Sindu walking towards her classroom.
sentences.chinese: 看着我的光头欣顿走向教室，那真是一大景色。

sentences.english: Computer-based modeling is taught in electronic classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 在电脑教室学习电脑化模型。

sentences.english: And he has now emerged as an international Internet guru, thanks to the global classroom the institute created to spread knowledge through cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 感谢网络教室，最近他名扬全球了。

definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to study outside of class time (reviewing one's lessons)/to study in one's free time/individual study
teacher in charge of a class
